item.title: Why I Built a Static Site in Clojure
item.description: At a summer barbecue, a friend asked if I could build a website for his new restaurant. But what he didn't know was that I haven't built a static site in nearly a decade. However I couldn't let him spend thousands of dollars on a cookie cutter website designed by a firm that knew nothing about his restaurant. We started coming up with ideas right away over a couple of beers.
